TopicTitle: KSP... what did you do to my probe?

Articles.Content: No cheats involved, it just... suddenly took off far past the speed of light and began spinning wildly. Can't even timewarp to try and stabilize it because it tells me "It is under acceleration".

Sounds like a bug. Moving to our Support (unmodded) subforum

Do you think you could provide us with a few extra details?

I'm honestly not sure what else to provide except I was checking on that probe via the Tracking Station then it went bonkers like that. When I went back after it told me that I couldn't return to the tracking station while under acceleration, so I reverted when it prompted me to. Checking on it again seems to have made it on it's normal orbit once again. Version is v0.90.0.705 Beta, which should be the latest version on Steam.

Hmm, weird. Well, if you run into this again, try to grab the output_log.txt file and upload. Also, pics of the ship itsel can sometimes help us figure out if it's a bug triggered by design issues or something else.

Cheers,

-Claw
